00315         static function write_stats($link, $page)
00316         {
00317         $userid = $_SESSION["user_id"];
00318 
00319         $query = "INSERT INTO users_statistics VALUES (NULL, " .
00320              $userid . ", '" . $page . "', NOW())";
00321 
00322         $link->query($query);
00323   }
